name: Getting to Know Your DSLR Camera
description: Learn the controls of your digital camera and improve your photographs along the way! Step by step instruction and demonstrations will be covered in class. Please bring your digital camera manual to class, along with your camera that is fully charged, and with back up batteries. This class requires a Digital SLR Camera.
fullDescription: Learn the controls of your digital camera and improve your photographs along the way! Step by step instruction and demonstrations will be covered in class. Please bring your digital camera manual to class, along with your camera that is fully charged, and with back up batteries. This class requires a Digital SLR Camera.

howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 For any questions please contact Photo Center 415-554-9522.
cost: This is a fee based service.
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
